Definition at line 38 of file lrs2373.c.

References CAR, CCR, DATA, data, i, mode, READ, SET_2373MODE, SET_INHIBIT, SET_TRANSPARENT, value, and WRITE.

00040               :
00041 
00042    Loads the memory of a LeCroy 2373 memory lookup unit.  Data to
00043    be loaded is taken from the file <filename>, in the format:
00044              <input1 (HEX)>  <output1 (HEX)>
00045              <input2 (HEX)>  <output2 (HEX)>
00046              <input3 (HEX)>  <output3 (HEX)>
00047              .
00048              .
00049              .
00050    giving the MLU output to be associated with each possible MLU input
00051    (0x0000 to 0xFFFF).  Each output is verified after loading.  The
00052    parameter <camac_slot> gives the number of the CAMAC slot in which the
00053    MLU resides.
00054 
00055    Alternatively, following filenames are reserved. The data
00056    is generated directly and stored in the MLU, which is faster
00057    than reading in a file:
00058 
00059    "1TO1"   Output equals input
00060    "OR1"    Output one is the or of all inputs
00061    "ORALL"  All outputs are the or of all inputs
00062 
00063 \**********************************************************************/
00064 {
00065    int q, x;
00066    WORD i, value, mode;
00067    WORD data;
00068    FILE *fd;
00069 
00070    mode = 0;
00071    if (strcmp(filename, "1TO1") == 0)
00072       mode = 1;
00073    else if (strcmp(filename, "OR_1") == 0)
00074       mode = 2;
00075    else if (strcmp(filename, "OR_ALL") == 0)
00076       mode = 3;
00077 
00078    /* Open input file */
00079    if (mode == 0) {
00080       fd = fopen(filename, "r");
00081       if (fd == NULL) {
00082          printf("lrs2373_set: Cannot find file \"%s\".\n", filename);
00083          return -1;
00084       }
00085    }
00086    printf("Loading %s into MLU in slot %d...\n", filename, camac_slot);
00087 
00088    /* Crate setup is done in InitUserDown */
00089 
00090    /* Set MLU inhibit and 2373 mode */
00091    value = SET_INHIBIT | SET_2373MODE;
00092    CAMO(camac_slot, CCR, WRITE, value);
00093 
00094    /* Verify MLU mode */
00095    data = 0;
00096    CAMI(camac_slot, CCR, READ, &data);
00097    if (data != value) {
00098       printf("lrs2373_set: Error setting inhibit/2373 mode. CCR is %X, should be %X.\n",
00099              data, SET_INHIBIT | SET_2373MODE);
00100       return -1;
00101    }
00102 
00103    /* set CAR to zero and verify */
00104    CAMO(camac_slot, CAR, WRITE, 0);
00105    CAMI(camac_slot, CAR, READ, &value);
00106    if (value != 0) {
00107       printf("lrs2373_set: Error setting CAR register. CAR is %X, should be %X.\n",
00108              value, 0);
00109       return -1;
00110    }
00111 
00112    /* Loop through input permutations, setting and verifying
00113       output for each */
00114 
00115    for (i = 0;; i++) {
00116       if (mode == 0)
00117          fscanf(fd, "%X", &value);
00118       else if (mode == 1)
00119          value = i;
00120       else if (mode == 2)
00121          value = i == 0 ? 0 : 1;
00122       else if (mode == 3)
00123          value = i == 0 ? 0 : 0xFFFF;
00124 
00125       if ((i & 0x0FFF) == 0xFFF)
00126          printf(".");
00127 
00128       /* Write output data */
00129       if (i == 0) {
00130          CAMO_RSTART(camac_slot, DATA, WRITE, value);
00131       } else {
00132          CAMO_REPEAT(value);
00133       }
00134 
00135       if (i == 0xFFFF)
00136          break;
00137    }
00138 
00139    /* Verify data */
00140    if (mode == 0)
00141       rewind(fd);
00142 
00143    CAMO(camac_slot, CAR, WRITE, 0);
00144    for (i = 0;; i++) {
00145       if (mode == 0)
00146          fscanf(fd, "%X", &value);
00147       else if (mode == 1)
00148          value = i;
00149       else if (mode == 2)
00150          value = i == 0 ? 0 : 1;
00151       else if (mode == 3)
00152          value = i == 0 ? 0 : 0xFFFF;
00153 
00154       if ((i & 0x0FFF) == 0xFFF)
00155          printf("=");
00156 
00157       /* Read data and compare */
00158       data = 0;
00159       CAMI(camac_slot, DATA, READ, &data);
00160 
00161       if (data != value) {
00162          printf("Error verifying data: Was %X, should be %X\n", data, value);
00163 //      return -1;
00164       }
00165 
00166       if (i == 0xFFFF)
00167          break;
00168    }
00169 
00170    /* Set Transparent and 2373 mode */
00171    value = SET_TRANSPARENT | SET_2373MODE;
00172    CAMO(camac_slot, CCR, WRITE, value);
00173 
00174    /* Verify MLU mode */
00175    data = 0;
00176    CAMI(camac_slot, CCR, READ, &data);
00177    if (data != value) {
00178       printf("Error setting transparent/2373 mode.  CCR was %X, should be %X.\n",
00179              data, value);
00180       return -1;
00181    }
00182 
00183    if (mode == 0)
00184       fclose(fd);
00185 
00186    printf("\n");
00187 
00188    return (0);
00189 }
}
